name: Skyemont Adventure
description:
Skyemont Adventure is a single player battle game set in an adventure realm. Each level increases both powerful weapons and dangerous enemies as well as more complex areas. Gameplay consists of free movement around each level with enemies spawning and attacking you in single or multiple numbers. You can swap weapons as you play including melee or magic weapons as you increase in power. The game includes a variety of music, sound and visual effects. Enemies range from natural animals like wolves and bears moving up to humanoids, giants and dragons. As you increase your win count, you receive more power and better weapons, but you also get more dangerous enemies to fight!

This prerelease version plays continuous mode, with new game modes and saving coming during the prerelease cycle.
